pages.title: Strong Enriching Catalyst
pages.text: Resources needed:$(li)[Tinker's Smeltery]$(li2)x2 Mushrooms$(li2)x50 Depthrock Pebbles$(li2)x1 Block of Clay$(li2)x1 Snow Block (500mb Water)$()$(br2)This Catalyst can be used to generate Undergarden Enriching Water by Throwing it in Weak Enriching Water

pages.name: Undergarden Enriching Water
pages.text: Resources obtained by $(li)Dropping:$(li2)Blank Pebbles$(li2)Blank Dust$(li2)Blank Nuggets
